Name: Formulaic Emoji Codebreaker
description: A wordle-like daily interactive web game that challenges players to test their logic by deciphering emoji-based codes.

Name: PokeTools - Team Builder
description: A strategic tool designed to help Pokémon players build, analyze, and optimize their teams.

Name: RaceTracker
description: A dynamic application for tracking and displaying upcoming race data and results for competitive events.

Name: Onyx Hiked the Colorado Trail
description: A web-based journal and photo gallery documenting a thru-hike adventure along the scenic Colorado Trail.

Name: Kiana Nadonza
description: A portfolio website created to help a friend showcase their skills.

Name: Hack Attack
description: An engaging, retro-style browser game that simulates a fun cybersecurity-themed challenge.
